HideStock.Name: Hide Stock Talent List
HideStock.Hint: If checked, hides the default list view of talents on the character sheet.

Enforce.Name: Enforce Tier Purchase Order
Enforce.Hint: Only allow purchase of talents if supporting lower tier talents exist (Pyramid Rule).

ModifyXP.Name: Modify XP
ModifyXP.Hint: Modify XP when talents are added or removed (Cost: Tier * 5).

PreventDebt.Name: Prevent XP Debt
PreventDebt.Hint: Prevent talent purchase if insufficient XP available.

HoverEnabled.Name: Hover for Talent Description
HoverEnabled.Hint: Shows the talent details in a popup window.

HoverDelay.Name: Hover to talent popup delay
HoverDelay.Hint: Number of seconds to wait before showing showing popup.

TextScale.Name: Scale Popup Text
TextScale.Hint: Adjust size of text in talent popup.

WidthAdd.Name: Talent Popup Width
WidthAdd.Hint: Increases the width of the popup window.

Dialog.DeleteContent: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?

Notifications.CtrlDelete: Hold CTRL and click to delete this talent.
Notifications.UnrankedDuplicate: The talent '{name}' is not ranked and cannot be purchased multiple times.
